feed.title: xlshhzl
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive, and powerful Jekyll theme for presenting professional writing.

entry.title: linux bluetooth
entry.summary: linux bluetooth 1. 基础命令 1. install install pakage bitbake bluez5 2. rfkill rfkill list 3. hciconfig hciconfig hci0 up/down #打开关闭蓝牙 4. bluetoothctl systemctl start bluetooth bluetoothctl dbus-monitor --system|--session 2. 使用 ~#: lsusb #查看硬件 Bus 003 Device 001: ID 1d6b:0003 Linux Foundation 3.0 root hub Bus 001 Device 003: ID 8087:0aa7 Intel Corp. Wireless-AC 3168 Bluetooth Bus 001 Device 00...
